615244.enhanced_desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, deals Break DMG equal to 210% of the Weakness Break DMG 1 time to all other enemy targets.

615245.name: All Things are Possible
615245.desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 100% of the DoT.
615245.enhanced_desc: If an enemy is attacked while under any DoT statuses, a random DoT will be triggered, dealing DMG equal to 150% of the DoT.

615250.name: Ignosticism
615250.desc: DoT effects applied by characters deal 24% more DMG.
615250.enhanced_desc: DoT effects applied by characters deal 36% more DMG.

615253.name: Tragic Lecture
615253.desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 10%.
615253.enhanced_desc: Increases DoT taken by enemies by 15%.

615254.name: Self-Manifestation
615254.desc: Reduces DEF of Enemies with their Weakness Broken by 15%.
615254.enhanced_desc: Reduces DEF of Enemies with their Weakness Broken by 20%.

615255.name: Emotional Decluttering
615255.desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 3%. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s).
615255.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target is afflicted with a DoT status, the DMG taken by them increases by 4%. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

615256.name: Offerings of Deception
615256.desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.0% of their respective Max HP.
615256.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy takes DMG from a DoT, all allies restore HP equal to 1.5% of their respective Max HP.

615257.name: Before Sunrise
615257.desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates 2.0 Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.
615257.enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy receives a DoT, regenerates 3.0 Energy for a random ally. Enemies can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.

615320.name: Elixir Seekers
615320.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Abundance, restoring HP for all allies by 100% of the triggering character's Max HP, dispelling all debuffs, and applying Purgatorial Eradication, lasting for 3 turn(s).

615330.name: Perennial Prosperity, Lush Longevity
615330.desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of healing received.
615330.enhanced_desc: Charges Dewdrop when a character's HP is restored. The Charge value is equal to 100% of the amount of healing received, and increases Dewdrop's DMG multiplier by 40% of the original multiplier.

615331.name: Mudra of Blessing
615331.desc: Charges Dewdrop at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 60% of their current HP.
615331.enhanced_desc: Charges Dewdrop at the beginning of a character's turn. The Charge value is equal to 70% of their Max HP.

615332.name: All Abundance in One Mind
615332.desc: When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 30% of the Outgoing Healing.
615332.enhanced_desc: Characters' Max HP increases by 20%. When a character provides healing, allies other than the healed target will also gain HP equal to 35% of the Outgoing Healing.

615340.name: Sin Dead, Grace Born
615340.desc: Restores HP to the character equal to 20% of the Charge value when Dewdrop ruptures, up to 18% of the character's Max HP.
615340.enhanced_desc: Restores HP equal to 20% of the Charge value when Dewdrop ruptures, up to 24% of the character's Max HP and no less than 12% of their Max HP.

615341.name: The Blessed Many
615341.desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for Dewdrop by 80%.
615341.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is full, increases the Charging Efficiency for Dewdrop by 120%.

615342.name: Candlelight Radiance
615342.desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of both units by 50% for 1 turn(s).
615342.enhanced_desc: When a character provides healing to allies, increases the ATK of all allies by 50% for 1 turn(s).

615343.name: Bitter Is the Bane
615343.desc: After launching attacks, characters deal Additional DMG equal to 36% of their current HP.
615343.enhanced_desc: Whenever a character attacks, deals Additional DMG to the enemy equal to 42% of the character's Max HP.

615344.name: Corporeal Pellucidity
615344.desc: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by 25% and increases Effect RES by 15% until after they are attacked.
615344.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is fully restored, reduces their DMG received by 30% and increases Effect RES by 30% until after they are attacked.

615345.name: Prajna Voyage
615345.desc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to 30% of the amount of HP healed.
615345.enhanced_desc: When being healed by an ally, characters restore extra HP equal to 45% of the amount of HP healed.

615350.name: Dharma Rain
615350.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by 24%, lasting for 1 turn(s).
615350.enhanced_desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, increases their Max HP by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615352.name: Extended Life
615352.desc: When a character has their HP lowered to below 50% for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to 30% of their Max HP.
615352.enhanced_desc: When a character has their HP lowered to below 50% for the first time in battle, they restore HP equal to 45% of their Max HP.

615353.name: Mudra
615353.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 16% of their Max HP.
615353.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, restores HP to the character equal to 24% of their Max HP.

615354.name: Peril Parry
615354.desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 24% for 1 turn(s).
615354.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their DEF by 36% for 1 turn(s).

615355.name: Back to Life
615355.desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 12% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.
615355.enhanced_desc: After a character provides healing, they restore HP equal to 18% of their Max HP. This effect can only trigger once per action.

615356.name: Force Victoire
615356.desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 10% for 1 turn(s).
615356.enhanced_desc: After a character is healed, increases their SPD by 15% for 1 turn(s).

615357.name: Anointment
615357.desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a 25% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.
615357.enhanced_desc: When a character's restored HP exceeds their Max HP, there's a 25% fixed chance to dispel 1 debuff on the character. This effect can be triggered up to 2 time(s) per turn.

615420.name: Galaxy Ranger
615420.desc: Spends 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of The Hunt, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies and Advances all allies' actions by 100%, with the Max Energy being 200.

615430.name: Empyrean Imperium
615430.desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
615430.enhanced_desc: When a character's turn begins, they gain 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost and sets the stack limit of Critical Boost to 12.

615431.name: Radiant Supreme
615431.desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 4 stack(s) of Critical Boost.
615431.enhanced_desc: After a character defeats an enemy, their action is Advanced Forward by 100%. At the beginning of the next turn, they gain 7 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

615432.name: Sovereign Skybreaker
615432.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
615432.enhanced_desc: After a character Breaks enemy targets' Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and the DMG they deal increases by 75%. The DMG Boost effect stacks up to 2 time(s) and lasts until the character is attacked.

615440.name: Skyward Vendetta
615440.desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and has the Critical Boost status, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to 150%.
615440.enhanced_desc: If a character has higher than 100% CRIT Rate and has the Critical Boost status, for every 1% CRIT Rate that exceeds 100%, CRIT DMG increases by 3%. CRIT DMG can be increased this way by up to 240%.

615441.name: Adept's Bow
615441.desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.
615441.enhanced_desc: When any ally uses their Ultimate or performs a follow-up attack, they can inherit Critical Boost, and the number of Critical Boost stacks increases by 1.

615442.name: Mistwraith Pursuit
615442.desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).
615442.enhanced_desc: When the same character acts consecutively, their ATK increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 times and gives a 50% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect cannot be triggered repeatedly.

615443.name: Starward Demonhunt
615443.desc: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by 12%. This effect stacks up to 2 time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.
615443.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, reduces their DMG taken by 12%. This effect stacks up to 3 time(s) and lasts until character is attacked.

615444.name: Borisin Chase
615444.desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character.
615444.enhanced_desc: After every 6 turn(s) conducted by all allies, the current character's action is Advanced Forward by 100%. The effect cannot be triggered repeatedly by the same character. Upon entering battle, 5 turn(s) are considered to have already passed.

615445.name: Rainbow Fang
615445.desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to 30% of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by 25%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615445.enhanced_desc: When a character defeats an enemy, restores all allies' HP equal to 45% of their respective Max HP and increases their ATK by 45%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615453.name: Thundering Chariot
615453.desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 20%.
615453.enhanced_desc: After a character inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, delays the enemy's action by 30%.

615454.name: Constellation Surge
615454.desc: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by 30%, lasting until the character is attacked.
615454.enhanced_desc: After characters Break an enemy's Weakness, increases their SPD by 45%, lasting until the character is attacked.

615455.name: Astral Menace
615455.desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 8%.
615455.enhanced_desc: At the end of a character's turn, their next action is Advanced Forward by 12%.

615456.name: Arboreal Volley
615456.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 4 Energy.
615456.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, they regenerate 6 Energy.

615457.name: Arrow Shades Bow
615457.desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 10% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.
615457.enhanced_desc: At the beginning of a character's turn, receives an ATK boost equal to 15% of the last-acting ally's ATK. This will last until the next turn starts.

615520.name: Antimatter Legion
615520.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Destruction, dealing Fire DMG to all enemies. Whenever a character is attacked or loses HP, they will gain an additional hit of DMG the next time the Boundary Resonance is triggered, up to 20 hits.

615530.name: Quasar Meltdown Constant
615530.desc: Every time a character loses or heals 20% of their HP, obtain 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect, with up to 8 stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restoration equals to 100% of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by 30%.
615530.enhanced_desc: Every time a character loses or heals 16% of their HP, obtain 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect, with up to 12 stacks can be obtained each turn. When the total HP lost or restoration equals to 100% of HP, increases the character's Break Effect by 45%.

615531.name: Boundary Density Expansion Group
615531.desc: Every time a character loses or heals HP, they gain 2 stack(s) of the Grit effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.
615531.enhanced_desc: Every time a character loses or has HP restored, they gain 2 stack(s) of the Grit effect and randomly grants 1 of their other teammates 1 stack(s) of the Grit effect. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time for each attack taken.

615532.name: Regression Inequality of Annihilation
615532.desc: When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.
615532.enhanced_desc: Receives 15% less DMG. When player characters are hit, DMG taken by the characters is distributed among all allies.

615540.name: Catastrophic Resonance
615540.desc: When characters with Grit use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by 10%. When Grit reaches more than 10 stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 30%.
615540.enhanced_desc: When characters with Grit use their Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate to deal DMG, increases DMG taken by enemies by 15%. When Grit reaches more than 10 stacks, additionally increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 45%.

615541.name: Indicative Depth of Field
615541.desc: Characters with Grit will receive 16% less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally reduces DMG by 8%.
615541.enhanced_desc: Characters with Grit will receive 20% less DMG. When their HP percentage is lower than 50%, additionally reduces DMG by 12%.

615542.name: Tide of Devastation
615542.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 70% Super Break DMG.
615542.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, the next time they attack a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 105% Super Break DMG.

615543.name: Decaying Implosion
615543.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their All-Type RES PEN by 10% and additionally increases Break DMG dealt by 20% until the start of the next turn.
615543.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their All-Type RES PEN by 15% and additionally increases Break DMG dealt by 30% until the start of the next turn.

615544.name: Disciplinary Flicker
615544.desc: If a character's HP is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP.
615544.enhanced_desc: If a character's HP is lower than 35% after being attacked or losing HP, restores their HP by 12% of their Max HP. The lower the current HP is, the more HP will be restored this way, but no more than 20%.

615545.name: Disruptive Pulse
615545.desc: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than 50%, restores a set amount of Energy equal to 50% of the character's Max Energy. This effect can only trigger again after 4 turn(s).
615545.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP percentage falls lower than 60%, restores a set amount of Energy equal to 50% of the character's Max Energy and 1 Skill Point(s). This effect can only trigger again after 4 turn(s).

615551.name: Reflection
615551.desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 1% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.
615551.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, instead of becoming downed, characters immediately restore HP by 30% of their Max HP. The allied team can only trigger this effect 1 time(s) per battle.

615553.name: Quasar Jet
615553.desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 24%.
615553.enhanced_desc: Increases Break DMG taken by enemies by 36%.

615554.name: Metric Reservation
615554.desc: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 100% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).
615554.enhanced_desc: Upon entering battle, characters consume their HP by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP, and gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 150% the HP difference between the character's Max HP and current HP, lasting for 3 turn(s).

615555.name: Sentinel Satellite
615555.desc: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 20% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.
615555.enhanced_desc: When a character's HP is lower than 50%, they gain a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 30% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) by each character per battle.

615556.name: Polarization Receptor
615556.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by 30% until the start of the next turn.
615556.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their DEF by 45% until the start of the next turn.

615557.name: Eternally Collapsing Object
615557.desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by 16% until the start of the next turn.
615557.enhanced_desc: After a character loses HP or heals themselves, increases their Effect RES by 24% until the start of the next turn.

615620.name: Masked Fools
615620.desc: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing follow-up attack DMG of a random Type to all enemies for 5 ‚Äì 10 time(s). And all allies' Basic ATK/Skill/Ultimate DMG are all considered as follow-up attack DMG, lasting for 1 turn(s).

615630.name: Vineyard: Against the Night
615630.desc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 80% of their ATK after the next time a follow-up attack is launched. This status can deal DMG up to 5 time(s).
615630.enhanced_desc: Every time a character uses a Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate, they will additionally deal Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 120% of their ATK after the next time a follow-up attack is launched. This status can deal DMG up to 5 time(s).

615631.name: Slaughterhouse No. 4: Rest in Peace
615631.desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 1 extra time(s).
615631.enhanced_desc: When characters launch follow-up attacks to an enemy, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of their ATK to the enemy being hit. If the enemy also has their Weakness Broken, then deals DMG for 2 extra time(s).

615632.name: Invitation to a Beheading: Weeping Blackbox
615632.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by 25%. This can trigger a max of 2 time(s) per enemy target's turn.
615632.enhanced_desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack on an enemy, the enemy's action is delayed by 25%. This can trigger a max of 3 time(s) per enemy target's turn.

615640.name: Portrait of A Man On Fire
615640.desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 60% of the original DMG.
615640.enhanced_desc: When causing Aftertaste DMG to an enemy, characters deal additional Aftertaste DMG of different Types for 1 time(s), at DMG values equal to 90% of the original DMG.

615641.name: The Hourglass Kindergarten
615641.desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 4% until the end of their next action.
615641.enhanced_desc: For every 1 Type of Aftertaste DMG the enemy received, reduces their ATK by 6% until the end of their next action.

615642.name: The Painted Albatross
615642.desc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 24% of their ATK to all enemies hit.
615642.enhanced_desc: For each enemy hit by a character's follow-up attack, the character deals Additional DMG equal to 36% of their ATK to all enemies hit.

615643.name: 12 Monkeys and Angry Men
615643.desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, increases follow-up attack DMG by 4%, stacking up to 24 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.
615643.enhanced_desc: When a character deals follow-up attack DMG to an enemy target, increases follow-up attack DMG by 5%, stacking up to 30 time(s) and lasting until the start of the next turn.

615644.name: As Good As Fleming
615644.desc: When a character uses follow-up attack on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 8% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).
615644.enhanced_desc: When a character uses follow-up attack on an enemy target, increases DMG received by the target by 12% for a max of 3 time(s), lasting for 1 turn(s).

615645.name: A Fish Discovered Fire
615645.desc: Characters' follow-up attack DMG ignores 20% of the target's DEF.
615645.enhanced_desc: Characters' follow-up attack DMG ignores 27% of the target's DEF.

615650.name: Behold Those Fools
615650.desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks by 44%.
615650.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks by 66%.

615651.name: Mostly Harmful
615651.desc: The Weakness Break efficiency increases by 35% when characters deal follow-up attack DMG.
615651.enhanced_desc: The Weakness Break efficiency increases by 50% when characters deal follow-up attack DMG.

615652.name: Suspiria
615652.desc: Increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by 26%.
615652.enhanced_desc: Increases characters' follow-up attack DMG dealt by 39%.

615653.name: Pale Fire
615653.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by 26%.
615653.enhanced_desc: Increases the CRIT Rate for follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by 39%.

615654.name: Back to the Lighthouse
615654.desc: When characters use a follow-up attack, restore 6 Energy. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.
615654.enhanced_desc: When characters use a follow-up attack, restore 8 Energy. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) per turn.

615655.name: Doctor of Love
615655.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by 10% of their Max HP.
615655.enhanced_desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, restores their HP by 15% of their Max HP.

615656.name: Platinum Age
615656.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by 40% for 1 turn(s).
615656.enhanced_desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increase their DEF by 40% for 2 turn(s).

615657.name: Clockwork Apple
615657.desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by 16% for 1 turn(s).
615657.enhanced_desc: After characters launch follow-up attacks, increases SPD by 16% for 2 turn(s).

615720.name: Swarm King Progeny
615720.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Enables a target ally to immediately take action and recover 5 Skill Point(s). Gains the Levitation effect. When any enemy unit gets defeated by a character that has Levitation, Boundary Equation regenerates 50 Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.

615730.name: Spore Discharge
615730.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spore(s).
615730.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, all enemies will gain 1 Spores. When all Skill Points are consumed, the SPD of the character who consumed the last Skill Point increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

615731.name: Fungal Pustule
615731.desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s).
615731.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point recovered, apply 1 Spore to 2 random enemy target(s). The max number of Spores increases by 3.

615732.name: Scythe Limbs
615732.desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed. For each Skill Point consumed, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 40%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until the character uses an attack.
615732.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Ultimate, the next time they consume or recover Skill Points, it will be considered as 1 additional Skill Point being consumed or recovered. For each Skill Point consumed or recovered, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 45%. This effect can stack up to 2 time(s), lasting until after the character uses an attack.

615740.name: Putrefaction Ulcer
615740.desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 2 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.
615740.enhanced_desc: Changes the number of times Spores can spread after bursting to 3 times. Can also spread to the original bearer of Spores.

615741.name: Lytic Enzyme
615741.desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 35% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to targets adjacent to them.
615741.enhanced_desc: Increases the DMG caused by Spores bursting. The DMG increased is equal to 50% of the original DMG. After the target enemy was defeated, the Spores they were carrying will spread to other enemy targets.

615742.name: Excitatory Gland
615742.desc: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by 30%. After consuming Skill Points, there is a 15% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.
615742.enhanced_desc: Increases the Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters by 50%. After consuming Skill Points, there is a 20% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

615743.name: Exposed Brain Matter
615743.desc: DMG dealt by Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 30% of the original DMG to a random adjacent target.
615743.enhanced_desc: DMG dealt by Basic ATK also deals DMG equal to 35% of the original DMG to adjacent targets.

615744.name: Intersegmental Membrane
615744.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 2 time(s).
615744.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the DMG received by them reduces by 8% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

615745.name: Catalyst
615745.desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 20% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).
615745.enhanced_desc: After a character uses their Skill and if the Skill did not unleash an attack, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 30% for 1 turn(s). This effect can be stacked up to 3 time(s).

615750.name: Osseus Blade
615750.desc: Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by 24%.
615750.enhanced_desc: Basic ATK DMG dealt by characters increases by 36%.

615751.name: Spinal Spur
615751.desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 24%.
615751.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 36%.

615752.name: Channeled Needle
615752.desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 40%.
615752.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for characters' Basic ATK DMG increases by 60%.

615753.name: Conjunctiva
615753.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
615753.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their DEF increases by 40% for 2 turn(s).

615754.name: Scaled Wing
615754.desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 1 turn(s).
615754.enhanced_desc: After characters use Basic ATKs, their SPD increases by 16% for 2 turn(s).

615755.name: Compound Eye
615755.desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 3 time(s) across all allies.
615755.enhanced_desc: After entering battle, recovers 1 Skill Point after each ally's turn. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) across all allies.

615756.name: Sporangium
615756.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 3 extra Energy.
615756.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character regenerates 4 extra Energy.

615757.name: Vesicle
615757.desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 10% of their Max HP.
615757.enhanced_desc: For each Skill Point a character consumes, the character restores HP equal to 15% of their Max HP.

615820.name: Astral Ecology School
615820.desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Erudition. Deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies. Additionally, links the enemy with the highest Max HP with other enemies, inflicting Central Link on all enemies and regenerating Energy equal to 50% of Max Energy to all allies.

615830.name: BCI-34 Gray Matter
615830.desc: When entering battle, charges the Brain in a Vat by 65%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness charges the Brain in a Vat by 35%.
615830.enhanced_desc: When entering battle, charges Brain in a Vat by 100%. Breaking an enemy's Weakness or attacking Weakness Broken enemies will charge Brain in a Vat by 40% or 5% respectively. This effect can only be triggered once by each enemy during each attack.

615831.name: SMR-2 Amygdala
615831.desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies will charge the Brain in a Vat by 50%.
615831.enhanced_desc: Dealing fatal DMG to enemies charges the Brain in a Vat by 50%. When the Brain in a Vat is fully charged, characters' SPD increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

615832.name: VEP-18 Occipital Lobe
615832.desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 20%. After an Ultimate is used, for every enemy target that is hit by this Ultimate, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt will additionally increase by 3%. This effect lasts until the next time an Ultimate is used.
615832.enhanced_desc: The All-Type RES PEN for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 25%. For each enemy target hit by the Ultimate that achieves the highest number of enemy hits in a single attack in this battle, the All-Type RES PEN for the Ultimate DMG dealt additionally increases by 3%.

615840.name: Attachment: Vestibular System
615840.desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 80%, lasting until this ability ends.
615840.enhanced_desc: When characters use Ultimates via Brain in a Vat, their CRIT DMG increases by 90%. This CRIT DMG increase lasts until the next attack ends.

615841.name: Implant: Explicit Memory
615841.desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 36% of their Max HP, lasting for 2 turns.
615841.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate via Brain in a Vat, they gain a Shield equal in strength to 45% of their Max HP, lasting for 3 turns.

615842.name: Mimesis: Tactile Pathway
615842.desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 15% of the character's ATK.
615842.enhanced_desc: After characters use an attack, they deal Additional DMG to the attacked enemy target(s). For every enemy target that was attacked, increase Additional DMG by 20% of the character's ATK. Up to 5 enemies that have been defeated in the current battle will also be regarded as having been attacked.

615843.name: Analysis: Subliminal Sensation
615843.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%, lasting until the end of the first Ultimate they use in battle. Upon entering battle, characters regenerate energy equal to 60% of their respective Max Energy.
615843.enhanced_desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 50%. Upon entering battle, regenerates energy equal to 100% of the character's Max Energy.

615844.name: Load: Striated Cortex
615844.desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 40% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.
615844.enhanced_desc: If characters' AoE ATK ability only attacks 1 enemy, this ATK will deal an additional set amount of DMG equal to 60% of the original DMG to the attacked enemy target.

615845.name: Stimulation: Saltatory Conduction
615845.desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 16%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.
615845.enhanced_desc: When characters use their Ultimate to attack enemies that are Weakness Broken, delay the enemy's action by 24%. Every time the enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, this effect can be triggered up to 3 times.

615850.name: Throne of Engaged Gears
615850.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 18%.
615850.enhanced_desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 27%.

615851.name: Ring of Bent Wires
615851.desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 18%.
615851.enhanced_desc: The CRIT Rate for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 27%.

615852.name: Scepter of Energy Torque
615852.desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 30%.
615852.enhanced_desc: The CRIT DMG for Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 45%.

615853.name: Torch of Anti-Lag Ignition
615853.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 50% more DMG.
615853.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, their next attack will deal 75% more DMG.

615854.name: Ion-Thruster Sword
615854.desc: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 24%, lasting for 2 turn(s).
615854.enhanced_desc: When characters use their Ultimate, their ATK increases by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

615855.name: Steel Forged Ribbon
615855.desc: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by 5.0% for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of 5 time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.
615855.enhanced_desc: After a character launches an attack, increase Max HP by 7.5% for every enemy target attacked to a maximum of 5 time(s). This effect lasts until the start of the next turn.

615856.name: Garment of Coiled Wires
615856.desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 16% of their Max HP.
615856.enhanced_desc: After characters use their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to 24% of their Max HP.

615857.name: Wreath of Interlaced Pipes
615857.desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 50% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.
615857.enhanced_desc: When struck with a killing blow, characters will not be knocked down and will instead consume all their Energy, then restore HP equal to 100% of the consumed Energy. This effect can only be triggered once per battle for the whole team.

670010.name: City Restorer
670010.desc: Comet Nucleus appears in the Action Order: Each time it takes a turn, absorbs all allies' Shields, reducing their values to 1 and turning the absorbed values into its own Shield. Afterward, it deals Physical DMG equal to 2500% of this value to all enemies, with a 75% base chance to Freeze enemies for 1 turn(s). When characters take damage, Comet Nucleus's Shield will be consumed first. When characters deal Quake DMG, 50% of Comet Nucleus's Shield will be considered as the character's Shield.

670140.name: Silent Hunter
670140.desc: When enemy targets enter battle, there is a 100% base chance for them to be inflicted with Dissociation that lasts for 1 turn(s). Enemies in Dissociation will resist all DMG, and all CRIT DMG and Break DMG taken are tallied. When the effect is dispelled, additionally deals a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 150% of the tallied value to all enemies. When the tallied value reaches 50% of the target's Max HP, Dissociation will immediately be dispelled.

670280.name: Self-Proof Institute
670280.desc: After Suspicion reaches 99 stacks, it will be consumed and turned into 1 stack of Self-Negation: Increases DoT dealt by the attacker by 70%. Each stack additionally increases it by 10%, stacking up to #10[i] time(s). At the start of an enemy's turn, they take Lightning DoT and cause adjacent targets to take Lightning DoT equal to 20% of the original DMG multiplier. At 2 or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates 20% of Brain in a Vat for a random character. At 3 or more stacks: At the start of the turn, regenerates 10% of Brain in a Vat for all allies.

670350.name: Borisin
670350.desc: Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. When Dewdrop breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by 550% of the Dewdrop's charge. When Flower of Annihilation takes action, it deals Fire DMG to all enemies based on the Charge value. Every stack of Grit held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by 1.5%.

670470.name: Molten Knight
670470.desc: After defeating an enemy target or Breaking an Elite Enemy's Weakness, the character will fire out a number of Lux Arrows equal to 5 plus the number of Critical Boost stacks to attack random enemies. Each Lux Arrow deals Additional DMG of the character's Type and applies 1 single Spore on the attacked target. While this effect is active, Spores can stack up to 99 times.

670500.name: Voyage Monitor
670500.desc: After a character deals Break DMG, deal a set amount of Additional DMG equal to 100% of the original damage after the attack. When a character's Grit reaches more than 30 stack(s), they gain a Shield equal to 50% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). After dealing Toughness-Reducing damage to all enemies, consume 20 stack(s) of Grit.

670630.name: Advisor Physician
670630.desc: DMG dealt by Dewdrop is considered as follow-up attack DMG. After Dewdrop burst as a result of the character launching a follow-up attack or using an attack, there is a 12% fixed chance every time for them to trigger the following effect: Charge Dewdrop for 80% of its maximum, and deals DMG equal to 1/2/3/4 time(s) of Dewdrop's Charge with a 15%/50%/30%/5% fixed chance.

670720.name: Child of Calamity
670720.desc: Enemy target obtains Borehole when entering battle: Borehole will record all Spores accumulated by the holder. After accumulating 18 Spores, the spores deal Quantum DMG to all enemies. For every debuff the enemy has, the DMG dealt increases by 10%, up to 100%. Then, the accumulated spores are cleared.

670860.name: Useless Scholar
670860.desc: After the team uses a total of 6 Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 80% of the attacker's ATK 1 time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The first character in the team lineup activates their Ultimate, Charges Brain in a Vat to 200%, and uses Ultimate 3 times before the status ends on them.

671020.name: The Pathless
671020.desc: When the character deals Quake DMG, every type of DoT effect active on the enemy target will increase the current Quake DMG multiplier by 50% of the original multiplier.

671030.name: Ecological Administrator
671030.desc: When characters deal Quake DMG, every character at Max HP will increase the current Quake DMG multiplier by 35% of the original multiplier.

671130.name: Memory Doctor
671130.desc: After a character launches an attack, Dewdrop will additionally deal Dewdrop DMG 1 time equal to 200% of the original Dewdrop DMG multiplier to all Frozen enemy targets. Every Frozen enemy target additionally increases the DMG multiplier by 25%.

671180.name: Astral Computer
671180.desc: When an enemy target leaves the Frozen state, all allies regenerate 4 Energy. When enemies' Dissociation state is dispelled, allies additionally regenerate 8 Energy.

671210.name: Sizzling Thunder
671210.desc: When an enemy target becomes Frozen, causes all currently active DoT on the target to immediately deal DMG equal to 180% of the original DMG. Each active DoT will apply 1 stack of Suspicion.

671260.name: Jester of Anatta
671260.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, there is a 100% base chance to apply 1 random debuff on the attacked target, lasting for 2 turn(s). The random debuffs include: Decrease DMG dealt by 15.0%, decrease DEF by 30.0%, and decrease SPD by 20.0%.

671340.name: Eternal Stranger
671340.desc: When Dewdrop Charges, for every 1% of CRIT Rate the character has, there is a 1% fixed chance to increase the Charge value. The increased ratio equals to 50% of the character's CRIT DMG.

671370.name: Viscorpus
671370.desc: Increases the maximum limit of Dewdrop by 75%. When a character breaks Dewdrop by using their Basic ATK, restores 35% of this Dewdrop's Charge.

671400.name: Disaster-Halting Mechanism
671400.desc: When a character loses any Shield, increases their SPD by 12%, lasting for 2 turn(s) and stacking up to 3 time(s). At the beginning of a character's next turn, they gain 2 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

671460.name: Bounty Hunter
671460.desc: When a character deals CRIT DMG, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally deal a set amount of CRIT DMG equal to 1‚Äì100% of the original DMG for 1 time(s). This is considered as follow-up attack DMG.

671510.name: Memosnatcher
671510.desc: When a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG, consumes their HP equal to 20% of their current HP. After this attack, there is a 50% base chance to inflict Freeze on the attack target, lasting for 1 turn(s). Every stack of Grit increases the character's Effect Hit Rate by 2%.

671520.name: Wastelander
671520.desc: After a character attacks a Weakness Broken enemy, converts the Toughness Reduction of the attack into 1 instance of 100% Super Break DMG. After accumulating 30 stack(s) of Grit, additionally deals 100% Super Break DMG caused by this effect.

671650.name: Firework Master
671650.desc: After a character launches a follow-up attack, deals to the attacked enemy target Aftertaste DMG equal to 500% of the total HP the character already lost 1 time. Then, clears the accumulated HP changes. HP change is accumulated up to 160% of the character's Max HP.

671670.name: Aether Phantom
671670.desc: Increases max Spores to 5. After characters launch a follow-up attack, apply 3 Spore(s) to the target.

671700.name: Serf of Calamity
671700.desc: When a character gains a Shield, causes 2 random enemy target(s) to gain 1 Spore. Spore's DMG multiplier increases by 75% of the original multiplier.

671780.name: Deceiver of Calamity
671780.desc: Increases max Spores by 3. After a character uses an attack that deals Ultimate DMG and if the attacked target's Spore bursts, then additionally deals Ultimate DMG equal to 200% of the character's ATK to the target. Every Spore burst by this attack increases this DMG multiplier by 30%.

671840.name: Silverheart Guards
671840.desc: When a character defeats an enemy or Breaks their Weakness, charges Brain in a Vat by 25% and also regenerates Energy equal to 10% of Max Energy. If the target is an Elite Enemy, additionally regenerates Energy equal to 40% of Max Energy.

671850.name: Anti-Organic Liquidator
671850.desc: When a character uses an Ultimate, consumes HP from all allies equal to 5% of their current HP and increases their DMG dealt by 30% to a max of 4 stack(s), lasting for 2 turn(s).

672010.name: Architect Scribe
672010.desc: If a character attacks and inflicts Freeze on an enemy target, then all allies gain a Shield equal to 25% of their respective Max HP, lasting for 3 turn(s). Every enemy target Frozen during this attack will increase the obtained Shield effect by 5% of their respective Max HP.

672050.name: Unsinkable
672050.desc: When a character receives a Shield, for every 1% of HP that is different between the character's Max HP and current HP, the Shield effect increases by 1.0%.

672060.name: Dreamweaver
672060.desc: When a character launches a follow-up attack, deals Quake DMG equal to 360% of the character's current Shield effect to the attacked target(s).

672100.name: Scholar of Candles
672100.desc: When a character takes fatal DMG, their HP will become 1, and they will obtain a Shield equal to 50% of their Max HP before entering a Freeze state that cannot be dispelled, lasting for 3 turn(s). While in this state, their HP cannot be restored, and taking fatal DMG again will dispel this state and cause the character to be downed.

672160.name: Biographer
672160.desc: After a character attacks a Frozen target, deals Aftertaste DMG 1 time equal to 180% of the character's ATK to the target.

672180.name: Armed Archaeologist Team
672180.desc: After an enemy target becomes Frozen, increase the Ultimate DMG they receive by 60%. This effect will last for 2 turn(s) after Freeze is dispelled.

672200.name: Night Watch
672200.desc: When the enemy target enters battle, they are inflicted with the Bleed effect. While Bleeding, they will take Physical DoT equal to 10% of their Max HP at the start of their turn. This DMG cannot exceed 650% of all allies' total Shield effect.

672240.name: Sin Thirster
672240.desc: Characters' DoT can cause CRIT Hit. When dealing DoT, CRIT DMG cannot exceed 100%.

672280.name: Common Mortal
672280.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, every stack of Suspicion they had will regenerate 0.30 Energy for all allies.

672340.name: Wingweaver
672340.desc: When an enemy target is defeated, increase the Charging Efficiency of Dewdrop by 10% up to a maximum of 10 stack(s). Also restores HP for all allies equal to 50% of their respective Max HP.

672350.name: Houyhnhnm
672350.desc: Every stack of Grit a character has will increase their Incoming Healing by 2%.

672370.name: Symbiote
672370.desc: Increases character's HP restoration by 35%. After healing allies, there is a 50% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point. This effect can trigger 1 time per character action.

672400.name: Borderstar Gunslinger
672400.desc: After a character is attacked and if they did not take DMG from this attack, they will only lose 1 stack(s) of Critical Boost.

672410.name: Amnesiac
672410.desc: When a character deals DMG to a Frozen enemy target, each stack of Critical Boost additionally increases CRIT Rate by 4% and CRIT DMG by 30%.

672430.name: Pacifist
672430.desc: When a character's turn begins, every stack of Critical Boost they have will restore their HP equal to 5% of their Max HP, and restore HP to allies equal to 2% of their respective Max HP.

672520.name: Walker of the Scorched
672520.desc: When a character has Grit, increases their All-Type RES PEN by 15%. Each stack of Grit a character has will increase their Break Effect by 3%.

672530.name: Pyromaniac
672530.desc: Each stack of Grit increases the character's Max HP by 6%, but Maximum Restorable HP will be reduced to 80% of the additional Max HP.

672580.name: Firesmith
672580.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 60%. Every 1% of HP a character loses will Charge Brain in a Vat by 0.5%.

672620.name: Candy Knight
672620.desc: Characters' Aftertaste DMG applies Toughness Reduction of the corresponding Type. If this effect breaks an enemy's Weakness, triggers the Weakness Break effect of the attacker's Type.

672630.name: Drifting Circus
672630.desc: Every time characters deal Aftertaste DMG, their Max HP increases by 5%, up to a max of 15 stack(s) and lasting for 1 turn(s).

672670.name: Balloon Merchant
672670.desc: Increases the follow-up attack DMG dealt by characters by 50%. After launching a follow-up attack, there is a 100% fixed chance to recover 1 Skill Point.

672710.name: Phantom Worker
672710.desc: Reduces enemies' Effect RES by 10% for each Spore stack they have.

672720.name: Afterglow Worker
672720.desc: Increases Spore's DMG multiplier by 60% of the original multiplier. When Spores burst, the DMG multiplier increases additionally by 3% of the original multiplier for each debuff the enemy target has.

672750.name: Starcrusher Worker
672750.desc: When a character uses a Basic ATK and their HP percentage is larger than or equal to 50%, consumes HP equal to 5% of their Max HP and additionally recovers 1 Skill Point.

672840.name: Penman
672840.desc: After a character attacks and deals Ultimate DMG, for every enemy target hit, deals Ultimate DMG equal to 100% of the character's ATK to the enemy target with the highest Max HP.

672860.name: Repairman
672860.desc: Ultimate DMG dealt by characters increases by 60%. After triggering a follow-up attack, every enemy target hit by the attack will make the next Ultimate ignore 5% of the enemy targets' DEF, stacking up to 5 time(s).

672870.name: Kolchis
672870.desc: For every 1 Skill Point consumed by characters, increases their Ultimate DMG dealt by 45%, up to a max of 135% and lasting until after using the Ultimate.
